title: Ideas left behind
description: Since I am planning to abandon some of my ideas (or at least leave it for the future) and dive into other projects and plans with more priority,  I am sharing with you my ideas here and in several future blog posts. I'm open to collaboration. Or you can steal the ideas and build things yourself :D As if I care...

tags.label: Documenting life
tags.description: Documenting what I have done or what I am planning to do

prevItem.title: Season "3rd year of studies" is closed
